item.title: CSE 103
item.description: :pushpin: Random(must): prime number: Problem:: https://codeforces.com/group/MWSDmqGsZm/contest/219432/problem/H Video :: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r5zf-0hAaAY Fibonacci: Problem:: https://codeforces.com/group/MWSDmqGsZm/contest/219432/problem/Y Video :: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6NgoxaJKDs sum of digit Video :: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IVHExlhBhrE&list reverse Video :: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NwFRZK5kj_U&list palindrome Video :: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1rVaH6_L3iQ&list :pushpin: String : Problem 01:: Fall 19(amader final exam) er 1 er (a) no Ques(((must))) Problem 02:: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0lZRNEi4Lr4&list Video Topics ::1. strlen, 2. strcpy,3. strcat,4. strcmp,5. strupr() and strlwr() :pushpin: Pattern & Series : Pattern: java pdf er page no - 129,133,137,152,159,202 »»»»»» bakigula somoy thakle dekhba Series: java pdf er 101,103,105,106,107,111,112,113 »»»»»» egula korlei enough :pushpin: Array: 1.

item.title: Binary Search
item.description: :pushpin: CODE-LIBRARY: // author: MSA int BinarySearch(int a[],int n,int target) { int low=0, high =n-1; while(low<=high) { int mid=low+(high-low)/2; // best formula to ignore overflow if(target==a[mid]) return mid; //mid element is the ans else if(a[mid]<target) low=mid+1; //moving to right side else high=mid-1; // moving to left side } return -1; //no value found } :pushpin: VIDEO-TUTORIALS : 1. mycodeschool 2. Errichto 3. AfterAcademy 4. Nick White :pushpin: PDF-TUTORIALS : 1.
